Stem: Greyish-green maturing to light brown, smooth. Comparatively narrow.
Leaves: Compound with 20-30 pairs of opposite leaflets about 1 cm long each.
Flowers: Showy fuzzy bright pink, pom-pom like in cluster of heads.
FruitSeeds: Brown or straw-coloured flat pod up to 15 cm long, with constrictions between the seeds.
Habitat: Woodlands, riparian areas, roadsides, grasslands, floodplains.
DistinguishingFeatures: Showy pink flowers distinguish from other tree legumes (Fabaceae).
